Thomas & Friends: The Great Race

Ano: 2016

IMDb ID: tt5563932

Sinopse: Get ready, get set, GO. When the best engines from around the world gather to compete in The Great Railway Show, Thomas is determined to find a way to represent Sodor. But he's left disappointed as Gordon is chosen to be the new "Shooting Star" for The Great Race. With Gordon and the other engines making the journey to compete, something suddenly goes terribly wrong... and Gordon is in danger. Will Thomas get to the mainland in time to help him and save the day? Join Thomas and his new international friends in this high-speed musical adventure where friendship always wins.—Universal Pictures
